content: pattern requires less than 1 oz of yarn excellent pattern for a beginning crocheter you can also use the pattern to make preemie booties the instructions follow the newborn instructions **from the web site **</br> booties are made in one piece and folded in half you can make them all different sizes by varying hook size or number of stitches and row a pattern for a matching hat 1 is also available 1 http //www bevscountrycottage com/hats-hats-hats html
